Articles.Content: This week a bind(SAS toggle) that I had on the joystick broke - does not respond anymore. After several tries and other movements sometimes it does turn on, but then it does not turn off. Am I supposed to reconfigure my joystick(if that will even work)?
I tried re-assigning the SAS toggle to another button, but nothing improved. Other functions(like landing gear toggle) have no issues, so I have to wonder whats up with SAS.
